Age.description: Your character's real age. No restrictions.
Age.name: Age

App Age.description: Apparent Age of your character. Limited to a number(e.g. 20) or a range of numbers (e.g. 20-22) or a limited set of text values(Preteen, Early Teen, Late Teen, Young Adult, Adult, Old).
App Age.name: App Age

Hair.description: Your character's hair color. No restrictions.
Hair.name: Hair

Eyes.description: Your character's eye color. No restrictions.
Eyes.name: Eyes

Sex Pref.description: Your character's sexual preference. No restrictions.
Sex Pref.name: Sex Pref

General.description: General information. Limited to 2000 characters or less.
General.name: General

Full Name.description: What is your character's full name? No restrictions.
Full Name.name: Full Name

Skin.description: What is your character's skin color/texture? No restrictions.
Skin.name: Skin

Gender.description: What is your character's gender, if different from sex? No restrictions.
Gender.name: Gender

Role.description: What is your character's BDSM role(Dom/Sub/Equal/etc)? No restrictions.
Role.name: Role

Owned By.description: Who is your character owned by? No restrictions.
Owned By.name: Owned By

Short Desc.description: A short one-line description. No restrictions.
Short Desc.name: Short Desc

Source.description: Source of your character, if from media.
Source.name: Source
